app_descript:
Health Passport Worldwide

Brief: Health Passport Worldwide is an innovative mobile solution designed to securely manage health test results, including PCR and rapid tests, without compromising user privacy. It's an essential tool for travelers, healthcare workers, and anyone needing to maintain a digital record of their health status in today's mobile-first world.
